com.kinvey.persistence.query
Class SimpleQuery

java.lang.Object
  com.kinvey.persistence.query.SimpleQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query
public final class SimpleQuery
extends Object
implements Query

Used to construct a valid Kinvey data query to send to the server.

Usage

The object will translate all of the operators given through addCriteria(String, String, Object) method to valid json query strings. 

 
 SimpleQuery q = new SimpleQuery();
 q.addCriteria("name", "==", storeName);
 q.orderByDescending("rating");
 
 MappedAppdata mappedAppdata = mKinveyClient.mappeddata("Stores");
 mappedAppdata.setQuery(q);
 mappedAppdata.fetch(StoreEntity.class, new ListCallback() {
 
  public void onFailure(Throwable t) {
      Log.d(TAG, "Error fetching stores data: " + t.getMessage());
  }
  
  public void onSuccess(List storeEntities) {
      Log.d(TAG, "Retrieved high " + storeEntities.size() + " scores");
  }
 });

Query modifiers

In addition to criteria, a few modifiers can be added to the query that will effect the results returned.

  • limit - returns a given number of results and nothing more
  • sort - will sort the results in ascending or descending order based on a given field
  • skip - instructs the server to skip a given number of records before returning the remain ones
